api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: API Key provided with your finstat account

ico_field.title: ICO field
ico_field.description: Name of field in the input file which contains the ICO number

#private_key.title: API Private Key
#private_key.description: Private Key provided with your finstat account

request_type.title: API Request type
request_type.description: Type of request, limited by your finstat account type. Options are : detail, extended, ultimate. Check Finstat documentation for more information
